text: The Tsardom of Bulgaria (), also called the Third Bulgarian Tsardom (), sometimes translated in English as Kingdom of Bulgaria (), was a constitutional monarchy in Southeastern Europe. It was established on 5 October (O.S. 22 September) 1908, when the Bulgarian state became a Tsardom. == References == Category:Government of Bulgaria Category:Former dictatorships Category:20th-century establishments in Bulgaria Category:1908 establishments in Europe Category:1946 disestablishments in Europe Category:Former monarchies of Europe
title: Kingdom of Bulgaria
